description:
Running the following command:

./run_tests.sh -N -n test_virt_drivers

Will lead to a whole bunch of failures

This command, however:

./run_tests.sh -N -n test_libvirt test_virt_drivers

works just fine.

Apparently test_libvirt is leaving some stuff overridden that it shouldn't be.
title: test_virt_drivers will not run alone

comments.content:
Running the following command:

./run_tests.sh -N -n test_virt_drivers

Will lead to a whole bunch of failures

This command, however:

./run_tests.sh -N -n test_libvirt test_virt_drivers

works just fine.

Apparently test_libvirt is leaving some stuff overridden that it shouldn't be.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/3745

comments.content:

Branch:    master

commit 459145e5d520a6ea4095448ad36366ab5d81d8b2
Author: Vishvananda Ishaya <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Feb 2 23:14:29 2012 -0800

    Allows test_virt_drivers to work when run alone
    
     * Properly sets fake_resize using a stub in test_libvirt
     * Adds a stub for test_virt_drivers
     * Fixes typo and misuse of flags in setUp and TearDown
     * Fixes bug 925891
    
    Change-Id: I015e942305f6a08941168ca0ccadb2382db064d7
